greeting:
NOTE: Closing this window will instantly terminate the server connection and undo your current presence on Discord!
This window will only notify of warnings and errors, if any occurs.
Have fun travels!
client_connected_exception:
WARNING: The application returned an exception trying to connect. This is probably due to Discord not being properly detected.
The following exception has been raised:
client_update_exception: An error occurred during presence update:
tkui_presence_details_tooltip: The first message that displays below the presence title (YNOProject).
tkui_presence_state_tooltip: The second message that displays below details.
tkui_presence_large_image_tooltip: The text that displays when hovering the large image.
tkui_presence_small_image_tooltip: The text that displays when hovering the small image.
tkui_notif_preferences_saved_exception: Could not save preferences! The error will be shown in the console.
tkui_notif_settings_saved: The configurations have been saved. Restart the application to apply the changes.
